events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on April 28th resulting in front-end damage to the vehicle.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report details and keywords related to collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle this case for faster processing and efficient communication.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of their auto accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including the police report and detailed vehicle damage photographs.
Assigned investigator initiated review of submitted evidence to determine claim validity and estimated repair costs.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and verified the extent of vehicle damage reported.
Proposed a settlement amount based on repair estimates and policy coverage to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively accepting the proposed settlement amount and expressing satisfaction with claim handling.
Claim was officially approved based on accepted settlement terms and documented investigation results.
Issued payment electronically to the claimant covering repair costs as outlined in the approved settlement.
Claim was closed successfully after verifying receipt of payment and confirming customer satisfaction with outcome.
